issue.title: C++: jemalloc externalproject doesn't build with CMake's ninja generator
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1169](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1169). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
To build `jemalloc` we currently use `$CMAKE_MAKE_COMMAND` which is the command CMake generated "makefiles" for. But jemalloc is setup to use configure & make always, thus this fails with the Ninja generator.

comments.body:
